Module edu.citadel.cvm
Package edu.citadel.cvm

Class CVM

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cvm.CVM
public class CVM
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements a virtual machine for the programming language CPRL. It interprets instructions for a hypothetical CPRL computer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CVM​(int numOfBytes)
    Construct a CPRL virtual machine with a given number of bytes of memory.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void loadProgram​(java.io.FileInputStream codeFile)
    Loads the program into memory.
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    This method constructs a CPRL virtual machine, loads the byte code from the specified file into memory, and runs the byte code.
    void run()
    Runs the program currently in memory.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • CVM

      public CVM​(int numOfBytes)
      Construct a CPRL virtual machine with a given number of bytes of memory.
      Parameters:
      numOfBytes - the number of bytes in memory of the virtual machine

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This method constructs a CPRL virtual machine, loads the byte code from the specified file into memory, and runs the byte code.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file specified in args[0] can't be found.

    • loadProgram

      public void loadProgram​(java.io.FileInputStream codeFile)
      Loads the program into memory.
      Parameters:
      codeFile - the FileInputStream containing the object code

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the program currently in memory.
